titleStmt.title: An ordinance for bringing the publique revenues of this Common-Wealth into one treasurie. Wednesday June 21. 1654. Ordered by his Highness the Lord Protector, and his council, that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Henry Scobell, Clerk of the Council.
Orders in Council. 1654-06-21.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
